Botanicary No. 7 RADIANCE - Rose Glow Omega Drops

Brand: BOTANICARY

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Capric/Caprylic Triglycerides (Coconut), Hydrogenated Farnesene, Rosa Canina (Rose) Fruit Oil*, Squalane (Olive), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Vitamin E Tocopherol, Citrus Au

ocopherol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Oil*, Salvia Sclarea (Clary Sage) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract

Directions: Gently massage 3-4 drops onto the face, neck and d collet in upward strokes. Apply as the final step in your skincare routine to lock in hydration and skincare actives. Increase absorption and hydratio

orption and hydration by applying with our RE-ENERGIZE Jade Crystal Sculpting Roller.

Warnings: N/A

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
